attributes.action: Create the structure for public minded individuals to join a volunteer reserve work force which can be brought into operation at the start of any postal strike to take over the running of national or local postal services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think the petition says it all. For my part, I am sick of having my life adversely affected, and my income reduced, by Royal Mail employees striking. They are hitting out at the public, who are NOT responsible for any gripes which they may have.

I would love to have the opportunity to spend whatever free time I have, helping to sort, transport and deliver mail, thus helping the public as a whole to maintain normal life. All it needs is a national volunteer organisation to put this into action.

If postal employees knew that this would happen, it would also be a great incentive for them to co-operate in meaningful talks, rather than walking out.
